# This file is autogenerated
title: removePhoneNumber
description: Overview of the removePhoneNumber method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseAlchemySigner/removePhoneNumber
---

Removes the phone number for the authenticated user, disallowing them from login with that phone number.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseAlchemySigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Returns

`Promise<void>`
A promise that resolves when the phone number is removed
